import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Moment from 'react-moment' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const PostItem = ({post:{_id,text,name,avatar,user,likes,comments,date},auth}) => { return (

{name}

{text}

Poste on {date}

Discussion {comments.length>0 && ( {comments.length}) } {!auth.loading && user._id===_id && ( )}
) } PostItem.propTypes = { post:PropTypes.object.isRequired, auth:PropTypes.object.isRequired, } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ auth:state.auth }) export default PostItem
